SequenceLocation.description: A Location defined by an interval on a referenced Sequence.

end.description: Start of the interval. TODO: VRS2 also allows intervals "Range" here.

sequenceReference.description: A reference to a Sequence on which the location is defined as an IRI. TODO: VRS2 also allows a SequenceReference object here, essentially a GA4GH refget accession object.

start.description: Start of the interval. TODO: VRS2 also allows intervals "Range" here.
